thread.title: Drake Congratulates Chance The Rapper On Grammy Win Via Text
thread.title_full: Drake Congratulates Chance The Rapper On Grammy Win Via Text

author: Zakk Feig
title: Drake Congratulates Chance The Rapper On Grammy Win Via Text
text:
Home > Music > Drake Congratulates Chance The Rapper On Grammy Win Via Text Drake Congratulates Chance The Rapper On Grammy Win Via Text 2 0 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 12, 2017 at 08:06pm Chance and Drake have a budding bromance. 
Drake and Chance The Rapper seem to be on good terms. Drizzy sent Chano some celebratory texts, after the Chicago rapper won his first Grammy ever for "Best Rap Performance" for "No Problem (Feat. Lil Wayne & 2 Chainz )." Chance took a screenshot of Drake's texts, and posted it triumphantly on IG. 
Chance will be performing tonight at the Grammy Awards, but Drizzy is out in Europe on tour and thusly cannot attend. Drake has already picked up two awards for "Hotline Bling," however. 
Check out Chance's Instagram post below, and stay up to date on who is winning Grammys tonight right here . A photo posted by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 12, 2017 at 4:15pm PST
